评论概述: Boxy Fit; Not for Tall Women
评论详情: The material is soft and stretchy. The shape is very boxy. I’m 5’10” and these hit, easily, 2 inches above my ankles when standing. While sitting, they land 3-4 inches above my ankles. I can’t wear them in public but missed the return window.

I love that the fabric is mostly rayon, which is so comfy, lightweight, and breathes great. I will probably order more and just keep wearing them into postpartum period when i don't know what day it is and can't be bothered to wear real pants. I wear a size 10 pants before pregnancy and the medium fit perfect.
So comfortable and they fit great. Absolutely recommend.

Being pregnant and only 4'11", finding clothes that fit comfortably can be a real challenge. I ordered a size small in these leggings at 23 weeks, and they're perfect! As I get later in my pregnancy, I don't always have the energy to put together a complicated outfit. These leggings are so easy to just throw on and feel comfortable all day. They don't put any pressure on my belly, which is a huge relief. I'm really happy with this purchase!  Pros:  Comfortable fit for petite frames Soft and stretchy material Easy to wear - looks good  Cons: None

I bought these for a friend who is in her second trimester (first time mom). She has practically lived in these pants (I bought several different items, and hands-down, these lived up to the review hype).
I put these on my wishlist and got a few for Christmas. They are very, VERY thin. After wearing them two days, the inner thighs are already worn through. It was incredibly disappointing.
Comfy but runs big
I need these in non-maternity size too so I can keep wearing them after my pregnancy! They are so soft and cozy.
These were very comfortable, but unfortunately I will be returning, as I was looking for more “athletic” material instead of a sweatpants feel.
These pants constantly slide down which makes them pretty uncomfortable.

These are great 3rd trimester pants. I ordered the ones with fleece inside and they are so comfortable and warm! I also love that the inseam length is perfect too - I struggle to find pants that are long enough to fit. The only reason why I give this a four-star is because for my height and weight, they are just a little big for my size group (not enough to fall down but enough to ride down occasionally).

Fits true to size. I wore these pants home from the hospital after a C section and during recovery at home. These were perfectly loose fitting and they come with pockets which is a major plus! I will be buying a 3rd pair to put in my rotation.
Not worth $40, more like $15 for two. Cheap material that looked like pj pants.

I think overall these are fine. The issue I have is the fit especially in the crouch area. They are kind of saggy and not flattering I always get made fun of by my kids when I wear them they call me a genie lol. I like that it has pockets and overall they are comfortable just not flattering. Being an expecting mom the fit is important like I want it to be flattering because of this changing body just modifying everything, you know? I won't buy again but I am in not necessarily unhappy with the buy I'm like a 50/50 on it.

I’m 17 weeks pregnant and I hate wearing anything without a maternity waistband. This is perfect for just around the house but they’re nice enough that I’d go around town or doing shopping. Super comfy and feels supportive. I also love that it has POCKETS. Like, REAL pockets. It’s hard to find comfy maternity clothes with pockets as well. Super happy with these!

评论用户: Love it! Very bright, my plants are super happy!
评论详情: Soft material, comfortable all day wear, doesn’t hurt my pregnant belly like some other pregnancy pants do.

评论概述: So comfy and perfect for a growing belly
评论详情: I love them! Got the green and red and might buy more! So comfortable. They do loosen up by the end of the day but are back to fitting snuggly after you wash and dry.

评论概述: For very short term of use
评论详情: Very comfy, stretchy, butpoor quality…lasts too short period and then looks very bad :(

评论概述: The crotch area is a no
评论详情: I wanted to keep these so badly as they are comfy and cute but the crotch area is so bulgy it’s horrible. Read other reviews with photos, not flattering at all.

评论概述: They bleed color even after washing
评论详情: I washed these before wearing in cold water in my HE washer. They bled on all the other clothes in the wash making black dye all over all my other clothes. I wore them the next day figuring it was out and it ruined my nails turning them black every time I stuck my hand in my pockets. Also dyed my turquoise phone case black from being in my pocket.

I’m 31 weeks pregnant and bought a second pair of these because they are just the perfect lounging around pants. They are thin but they are not see through. Not pregnant, I live in lululemon leggings but I am not going to spend that kind of money for something I just need for a couple of months during pregnancy. These are great!

These are very thin, and I was really hoping for actual cozy, thick, winter sweatpants. I'm 5'7" (was 140) and now 11weeks pregnant, so I'm still pretty small, and the Large is quite big on me. I will still keep them for later on, but these are not what I had hoped. Should be wayyy cheaper for how thin they are. Dissapointed.
The elastic material which comes over the belly is such poor quality, it keeps falling down. Even in the third trimester big belly, it doesn't stay put.
Have have 2 now might order a 3rd they are literally the best pants Got them at 5 months pregnant and now I’m 7 months and still fit comfortably I ordered a large for comfort
I am  5’7”, 185 lbs, and 28 weeks pregnant. These are super comfortable and I have room to get bigger still.

评论概述: Wish I could always wear these pants
评论详情: These may be the most comfortable maternity pants I’ve ever owned. They don’t squeeze your belly, but they don’t feel like they will fall off either. The pockets are placed well and functional. Some maternity pants designed over the belly feel awkward and uncomfortable, but these do not. The color option was cute as well.
Thin material that pills after one wash. Looks like pajamas.
I love how comfortable and soft these maternity pants are!
Fit was cute, sizing as expected, but thin. Kind of like T-shirt material. Might be good for warmer climates, but was looking for something warm to get me through cold winters - this wasn't it.
I love that these pants have pockets! They also are light weight and comfortable!

These pants are very comfy. I got a size large in another color and they slide off so I went down to a medium and they're perfect. Breathable, stretchy, and not too tight on my stomach. I absolutely love these.
Comfortable but thin and see through. Fine if you have a long enough shirt I guess but will probably only be worn around the house.

I am 5’8” 189lbs at 36 weeks pregnant and HATE anything on or around my belly, I ordered up from my usual size and got a large and they fit so perfectly and SO comfy! The band isn’t tight around my belly, the length is phenomenal as being tall nothing is ever long enough! I wish I would have found these sooner!!

评论概述: If you’re in the second or third trimester during the colder months these are a MUST
评论详情: The fabric is so soft and comfortable. It doesn’t make you feel overly hot but it also keeps you cozy when the fall and winter weather gets nippy. I got two pairs while they were on sale and I definitely feel like I got a huge bang for my buck. 10/10 would definitely recommend! I got a medium and am at 26 weeks, 5’3” and at about 160lbs, the medium fits perfect!
These are great really comfortable, they are thin and light weight so really great to go from summer to fall in would buy again!

I’m 15 weeks pregnant and you can fold over the panel to make them more like normal pants if you want. Come down and cover my ankles all the way. I am 5’8, but normal size legs (my torso is long). The material is extremely soft and on the thin side. Amazon recommended size L which fit great, tho I normally wear size medium, so be advised!
These are jogger style sweats. Nice and thick and warm. Sooo comfortable!!! Very casual.

I bought my normal size and they are so loose. They don’t fall down, but just feel insecure,  They are already pilling after 5 uses. I’ll continue to wear them for my pregnancy but wouldn’t purchase again.
These were stretchy and soft. I'm normally a medium before pregnancy and I picked medium again and they fit great.

I LOVE these pants. The material is very soft. They fit great, not tight around the waste line. I love that there's pockets and you can actually stick a phone in them without falling down. The belly band comes up to a good height and is very comfortable. I'm normally a size medium, pre pregnancy and I ordered a size medium. I'm currently 20 weeks and they are stretchy enough I think I'll be able to wear them the whole pregnancy.
I came back to buy another color. Very comfortable

I have only had these for about a week, but I am obsessed! They are SO comfortable. I am 12 weeks pregnant, but already have a baby belly. They are comfortable on my belly with is hard to find. I wouldn't say they are super flattering, but they aren't terrible. I sized up, but I like things more loose so they are perfect! Will definitely buy more before these 9 months are over! Also, not too hot or cold. Perfect for everyday wear.
Great price. It was a gift. She liked them
These maternity joggers feel so weightless and so comfortable. I'm on my third order and not even halfway through my pregnancy
I was so over my tight maternity leggings, these are so soft and cozy and don’t dig into my bump.  Love them!

These are the most comfortable maternity pants I've ever owned. I've been full term pregnant 4 times. I'm in my 3rd trimester now. These are SO COMFORTABLE. You will not regret buying them. Seem true to size as well.

评论概述: Can’t get rid of the smell
评论详情: I have soaked them every day in a vinegar solution, rinsed it out, washed in the washing machine and then repeated the process every day for over a week and they still stink. They’re very soft and comfortable, but the smell has rendered them unwearable for me. I’m already pretty sensitive to smells, but pregnancy heightens that, so these are just unwearable for me due to the smell.

Someone on Instagram shared these so thought I would try them when they were on sale. These pants are so comfy! They make great around the house pants or PJ pants. I love that they have pockets (so hard to find maternity pants with pockets). They fit exactly how I thought. May end up buying another pair as the weather gets colder. 10/10!

These things are comfy. 🥰🥰 They’re not super thick, so don’t count on them for the real cold — they’re not sweatpants. But for 2nd-3rd trimester mommas, these are a solid comfy basic to have. You could fall asleep in them (not that you weren’t already tired) 😴… or do a little nursery organizing. They’re a go-to.  (Weight = 3rd tri)

I’m always so skeptical of joggers hitting more of 7/8 length due to my height. But these feel and look great! I’m 5’11, 23 weeks pregnant and pre-pregnancy weight was 172.  Ordered size L and plenty of stretch to go to last until 40 weeks.
Is comfortable but not too stretchy, love it because make you look cute every where and casual, comfy YES.

Love these - so comfy. I was tired of wearing maternity clothes that were still too tight on my stomach. I’m 8+ months pregnant and I feel like there is still room to grow in these. Would definitely recommend. Soft, light & has pockets!
I like that they come up over the bump, but the fabric is very very thin and I find it itchy! Bummed, wish I loved them more.
Love these doesn’t even feel like I have anything on my waist

So these aren’t athleisure wear so to speak they are more soft but not in a fuzzy pilling kind of way. I love them! I got a medium I’m 21 weeks pregnant on baby number 2 so I’m much bigger than first time around and I would say they are pretty big on me. I’m 5’1 for reference as well. They are a little long but I don’t mind it they still sit at my ankle but I have to pull them up quite a bit! I would buy again! So comfy! Hope this helps!

These are my favorite lounge maternity pants I've ever worn!
This was a gift for my pregnant daughter. They are her favorite pants to wear. Highly recommend!
These are very thin material and incredibly see through. I would NOT recommend.
Pants had no tag, and a few stray animals hairs on them......I do not own animals. I am very adverse to animals and animal hair. Gross.
these are SUPER comfortable and fit so well.
Most comfortable pants!!!
Super comfortable, I love these! Definitely want more. 10/10

评论详情: Soft and comfortable to use at home only. They collect literally everything.
These pants are perfect for lounging, going on a walk, etc. super soft. I got my usual pre-pregnancy size and they fit perfectly!

I ordered smalls in the 2 pack and unfortunately received Mediums. I’m 5’2” 117lbs, haven’t even tried them and I know they’ll be too big. Also, they looked pretty used already, there’s so much pulling on the black ones, and some on the gray ones. Returning because wrong size and not what I expected quality.

Amazon feels like the only place selling maternity pants that can fit plus size and they did not fail, got 2 pairs and I’m obsessed!!! They’re a bit thin but no where near the point where you can see your underwear through them, I prefer it since I overheat so fast, I’m also 5’9 and I was worried they’d be to short since I also have curves plus my bump and they were the perfect length :)
These are so good!!
There comfortable and soft but the only thing I don’t like it’s when I put my phone in my pockets the pants slowly goes down too.

These are hands down my favorite maternity pants. They were the only ones still easy to get on and off when I was 40 weeks pregnant. Now I'm two months postpartum and have lost a lot of weight, but these are still my go to sweats. Definitely recommend.
I should have gotten all colors very comfortable

Highly recommend to all the pregnant mamas out there. I’m wearing a pair now and ordering two more pairs after I write this review. So so cozy and comfortable. Perfect for inside in the summer or outside in the morning or evening. Not too thick material. Will be perfect for fall! Hugs the belly without being tight. I’m a large in majority of bottoms and that size fits perfect with room to grow in the belly as I am in my 2nd trimester. Save your sanity trying to find something comfortable to wear while you're pregnant, your body is changing, you’ll be so glad to have these in your closet!
Black was see through. Disappointed because they are comfy.
The fit is perfect and they are light weight and flowy.

I ordered these pants earlier this spring and love the first two pairs I received. I ordered another two pairs ~6 weeks later and they are at least 3.5 inches narrower in the waist than the previous pairs, despite being the same size. In the photo you can see the newer pair on top. The fabric is also different. The color is slightly lighter and the feel is less flowy. I'm disappointed because I was ready to live in these pants this summer. The first two pairs I bought are my favorite pants!
Soft with good stretch but runs large! I’m normally a medium pre-pregnancy but the smalls fit great!

They're nice and stretchy and so far have fit from first trimester to third trimester. My only complaints are that they've all started to pill a bit and they slip down my stomach if I have things in the pockets. The work around for this is to tuck a shirt into the pants so they can't slip. I'm still really happy with them even with the pilling. I'm pregnant and they're comfortable so that's enough for me!
Super comfy and love the material.

I bought these as a gift for my friend who is expecting. She just recently was able to wear them now that her belly is growing, she wore them once and said they are already piling! Bummed hoped she could get more use out of them.
Comfortable, though a little loose around trouser legs.
These are a pregnancy staple in my closet. I wear them constantly and they are so soft, stretchy, and easy to wear. I sleep in them, workout in them, and even wear them to work. Highly recommend.

I wish I had bought them sooner. They were so comfortable I continued to wear them postpartum. They were thinner than I expected which was OK with me since I live in Arizona and ran hot due to hormones. Highly recommend these to the upcoming mamas.
More like lounge pants than true joggers. Personally, I wouldn't leave the house in these because they're just so thin and cheaply made. But they're super comfy around the house.
I love these pants! They are buttery soft and fit amazing. I got my normal (pre pregnancy) size which is medium and they fit perfectly. Soft and stretchy over the bump!
Love these pants, super comfy.
I hate these pants I ordered an X-Large and these pants have no stretch Also the quality is terrible Skip on these

Wanted to keep these so bad, but they were HUGE. Definitely wouldn't have stayed on, which was surprising. Usually I'm an XS but have been more S while pregnant. Still huge. Very comfy and would've been great lounging/errands pants!

These pants are very comfy and go over my bump perfectly. However I realized at an appointment while I was sitting down that I could see my skin through the pants. No one else probably noticed but it was enough to make me self conscious. I will only be wearing them around the house.
Very comfortable. Fabric is excellent. Can see myself growing in this one
Only three stars because they have a hole in the crouch area right when I received them. They are super comfy tho. Bummer I can’t wear them
I loves these they are so comfy BUT they attract so much lint that they look speckled 😞 I wear them at home or where I don’t mind the look of lint

I wore them all the time during pregnancy, since the belly appeared. On the one hand, a very pleasant fabric. But on the other hand, pills appeared on them in the very first week of wearing them, so they can only be worn as home clothes. Plus they have a bad cut in front, under the belly it looks like a man’s clothes are hanging
I will definitely order another pair! These are my favorite pants. Light and comfortable with room to grow!
Purchased as a gift for part of granddaughter-in-law's Christmas. She says the maternity pants are stylish and extremely comfortable.

I’m at week 35. So glad I bought medium. It’s not too tight around the belly. The pockets were a great idea and pants are very comfortable, but black pants started pilling between my inner thighs after a couple weeks. Could be how I washed them, but it didn’t happen to the gray pants.
These are my favorite maternity sweat pants, they are so comfy and I can wear them either over the belly or under the belly. They’re not tight or compressing at all!

I ordered a size medium. I’m 5’7’’ 21 weeks pregnant. Through the day they started sliding down and not staying up. Right off the bat, they gave me camel toe. They are soft, but having to keep pulling them up throughout the day was very annoying.

评论概述: So comfy! I wish they were better quality.
评论详情: Love these comfy maternity pants. I’m tall, and they’re a great length. The only downside is that the material has already started to get tiny little burs/balls all over due to wear. I’m a mom and am on the ground playing with kids a lot, and it’s definitely having an impact on these pants. Overall, super comfy, I just wish they were a little higher quality of fabric.

I was pleasantly surprised to put on these sweatpants and feel like silk was against my legs. Seriously the softest sweats ever, plus nice and lightweight material so you won’t overheat. I’m ordering more pairs right away!
